text: Allt om Historia is a Swedish language history magazine based in Malmö, Sweden. ==History and profile== Allt om Historia was established in 2005. The first issue published in September 2005. Based in Malmö, the magazine covers articles and book reviews about historical events. It was based in Lund and was part of Historiska media until 1 June 2016 when it was acquired by the Bonnier Group. It is published by the Bonnier Publications fourteen times a year. The circulation of Allt om Historia was 26,700 copies in 2014. ==References== ==External links== * Official website Category:2005 establishments in Sweden Category:Bonnier Group Category:History magazines Category:Magazines established in 2005 Category:Mass media in Malmö Category:Magazines published in Sweden Category:Swedish-language magazines Category:Monthly magazines published in Sweden Category:Mass media in Lund
title: Allt om Historia
